fu.geo

Class SphericalJTS

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.geo.SphericalJTS

  • public class SphericalJTS
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides spherical geometry computations on JTS geometries.

    • Constructor Summary

      SphericalJTS()

    • Method Detail

      • nearestPoints

        public static double[] nearestPoints(Geometry geom1,
                                     Geometry geom2)
        Taken two geometries: what are the points of each geometry that is closest to the other geometry. In other words: What are the two positions that indicate the distance between two geometries?
        Parameters:
        geom1 - first geometry
        geom2 - second geometry
        Returns:
        array of 4 with [0],[1]: lat/lon of geometry 1, [2],[3]: lat/lon of geometry 2

      • nearestPoint

        public static double[] nearestPoint(double lat,
                                    double lon,
                                    Geometry geom)
        Taken position and a geometry: what is the point of the geometry that is closest to the other geometry.
        Parameters:
        lat - position latitude
        lon - position longitude
        geom - geometry
        Returns:
        array of 2 with [0],[1]: lat/lon of the geometry

      • metersBetween

        public static double metersBetween(Geometry geom1,
                                   Geometry geom2)
        Computes the distance between two arbitrary geometries. For this, it computes the two nearest points of the respective geometries and returns the great circle distance of these. and returns the great circle distance.
        Parameters:
        geom1 - first geometry
        geom2 - second geometry
        Returns:
        distance in meters

      • metersBetween

        public static double metersBetween(double lat,
                                   double lon,
                                   Geometry geom)
        Computes the distance of a coordinate to a geomtry. For this, it computes the nearest point of the geometry to the given coordinate and returns the great circle distance.
        Parameters:
        lat - position latitude
        lon - position longitude
        geom - geometry
        Returns:
        distance in meters

      • createBuffer

        public static Geometry createBuffer(Geometry geom,
                                    double bufferDist,
                                    int circlePoints)
        Creates a buffer around the geometry in meters. To do this, each point first is translated to Gauss-Kruger coordinates and after the buffering, reversed to lat/lon. As a result, this method is not appropriate for geometries that span larger areas of longitudes.
        Parameters:
        geom - given geometry
        bufferDist - buffer distance in meters
        circlePoints - count of vertices to approximate round corners
        Returns:
        new geometry

      • createRect

        public static Geometry createRect(double lat1,
                                  double lon1,
                                  double lat2,
                                  double lon2)
        Creates a rectangle (as Polygon geometry) parallel to latitude an longitude axes.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - one rectangle's vertex (latitude)
        lon1 - one rectangle's vertex (longitude)
        lat2 - rectangle's opposite vertex (latitude)
        lon2 - rectangle's opposite vertex (longitude)
        Returns:
        rectangle's geometry

      • createCircle

        public static Geometry createCircle(double lat,
                                    double lon,
                                    double radMeters)
        Creates a circle (as Polygon geometry) around the geometry in meters.
        Parameters:
        lat - circle's centre (latitude)
        lon - circle's centre (longitude)
        radMeters - circle's radius
        Returns:
        circle's geometry

      • createCircle

        public static Geometry createCircle(double lat,
                                    double lon,
                                    double radMeters,
                                    int polygonPoints)
        Creates a circle (as Polygon geometry) around the geometry in meters. The number of points to approximate the circle is passed.
        Parameters:
        lat - circle's centre (latitude)
        lon - circle's centre (longitude)
        radMeters - circle's radius
        polygonPoints - number of vetrices to approximate the circle
        Returns:
        circle's geometry

      • areaSize

        public static double areaSize(Geometry geom,
                              boolean failNonArea)
        Computes the area size of area geometries in square meters. This method deals properly with multi-geometries or geometries with holes.
        Parameters:
        geom - the JTS geometry of interest
        failNonArea - true: if the geometry or some of its parts are a geometry without surface area (e.g. Point, LineString), the method issues a RuntimeException, false: the area of 0.0d is returned
        Returns:
        area size in m2

      • lineLength

        public static double lineLength(Geometry geom,
                                boolean failNonArea)
        Computes the line length of line geometries in meters. This method deals properly with multi-geometries.
        Parameters:
        geom - the JTS geometry of interest
        failNonArea - true: if the geometry or some of its parts are non-lines (e.g. Point, Polygon), the method issues a RuntimeException, false: the area of 0.0d is returned
        Returns:
        length in meters
